attributes.title: Description
attributes.value: Pudin Hara Active has pudina ka satva, a known and powerful ayurvedic ingredient which is natural, provides cooling effect and helps effectively in stomach pain, gas and indigestion. It gives fast relief from stomach ache, indigestion and gas. Totally safe and natural, Pudin Hara is a fast-action cure for stomach disorders.

attributes.title: Key Features

Effective cooling relief from gas, indigestion and stomach ache
Safe and natural

attributes.title: Description
attributes.value:
Vicks VapoRub contains Menthol, Camphor and Eucalyptus Oil, known for their therapeutic benefits in cough and cold relief. It provides effective multi-symptom relief from 6 symptoms- Blocked nose, Breathing difficulty, Cough, Body Ache, Headache & Muscular stiffness

Directions:
Apply on chest, throat and back for relief from 6 cold symptoms: Breathing difficulty, body ache, cough, blocked nose, headache and muscular stiffness. Start feeling relief in 5 minutes from cough, blocked nose and breathing difficulty. Steam Inhalation: Add 1-2 teaspoons to bowl of hot water (not boiling). Cover head with towel. Lean over bowl to form tent. Gently inhale for 10-15 mins. Repeat up to 3 times per day.

Ingredients:
Content/100g: Pudinah Ke phool 2.82g, Karpoor 5.25g, Ajowan Ke Phool 0.10g, Tarpin Ka Tel 5.57ml, Nilgiri Tel 1.49ml, Jatiphal Tel 0.54ml, Base q.s.

Caution: 
Use as directed. For external use only.
Dont take by mouth or place in nostrils. Keep out of reach of children.
Consult a doctor if illness persists for over a week, or if used by children less than 2 years or if pregnant /breastfeeding. Dont use on broken / damaged / bandaged skin.
For Steam Inhalation  Dont add Vaporub into boiling water. Dont heat or reheat (using stove /microwave) Vaporub together with water. Steam inhalation is suitable for use on adults and children more than 6 years. Closely supervise children to avoid scalding. Use care when using with hot water.

attributes.title: Key Features
attributes.value:
Get instant relief from 6 Cough and Cold symptoms.
Relieves Cough, nasal congestion, body ache, headache, muscular stiffness and body ache.
Suitable for steam inhalation on adults and children more than 6 years. Take one scoop of Vicks Vaporub and add it to hot water and inhale the vapors to get instant relief from the 6 Cold and Cough symptoms.
Suitable for adults and children above 2 years old.
Contains natural ingredients like Menthol, Camphor and Eucalyptus Oil known for their therapeutic benefits in cold and cough relief.

products.name: Nestle NANGROW Nutritious Health Drink (Creamy Vanilla, for Growing Children)
Complan Kesar Badam Nutrition and Health Drink - Pack of 2
Complan Creamy Classic Nutrition and Health Drink
Cadbury Bournvita Chocolate Health Drink (500 g)
Aptagrow Chocolate Flavour Health Drink (For 3+ Years)
Cadbury Bournvita 5 Star Magic Chocolate Health Drink
Complan Royale Chocolate Nutrition and Health Drink

attributes.title: Description
attributes.value: New Lactogrow is a nutritious milk drink with immunonutrients, probiotic L. reuteri and other essential nutrients for your childs happy growth. It contains essential nutrients that help support normal physical growth & development, brain development, cognitive development, immune system function and bones development, and is easy to digest. Everything you do, makes a difference. Along with the right nutrition and encouraging social interactions, playful activities like singing songs, drawing and building blocks, create an environment for your parenting to lay the foundation for your childs happy growth. Suggested Servings: 2 serves per day. Recommended to be consumed along with variety of foods like cereals, pulses, fruits & vegetables for your 3-6 year old child. Storage: On opening, transfer the contents of the pack along with the pouch into a clean airtight container. Replace the lid tightly after every use and store in a cool, dry place. Ensure enclosed scoop is thoroughly washed and dried before use. After opening, use the contents within 3 weeks or best before date, whichever is earlier. Contraindication: Not for children with galactosemia or lactose intolerance. Use in immunocompromised infants (e.g. long-term steroid therapy, lymphoma, etc.) should be after consulting your doctor.

attributes.title: Key Features
attributes.value:
A nutritious milk drink, in a delicious biscuity vanilla flavour
Contains Probiotic L.reuteri
Vit A, C, Iron, Zinc & Selenium to support normal Immune system function
Protein, Vit B1, Vit B2, Folic Acid, Vit B12, Vit A to support normal Physical growth
Calcium & Vitamin D to support normal Bone development
High Quality Whey Protein which is easy digest
BAG-IN-BOX FORMAT: For safety, hygiene and convenience
Nutritious Milk Drink for growing children/kids/toddlers, nutrients for immune system function and growth, (Milk Powder, Health and Nutrition)

attributes.title: Ingredients
attributes.value:
Ingredients: Milk solids (58.6%), Maltodextrin, Demineralised whey (8.5%), Oil mix (Low erucic rapeseed oil, Coconut oil, High oleic sunflower oil, Sunflower oil, Antioxidant (304) and Sequestrant (330)), Soyabean oil, Corn oil, Minerals*, Emulsifier (Soya lecithin), Choline bitartrate, Vitamins#, Probiotic (Lactobacillus reuteri (DSM 17938)) and Acidity regulators (525 and 330).

Probiotic (Lactobacillus reuteri (DSM 17938)) = 10^8 cfu/day based on recommended serve size.

Minerals*: Calcium citrate, Potassium citrate, Sodium citrate, Potassium phosphate dibasic, Magnesium chloride, Ferrous sulphate, Zinc sulphate, Cupric sulphate, Manganese sulphate, Potassium iodide and Sodium selenite.

Vitamins#: Sodium ascorbate, dl-alpha-tocopheryl acetate, Nicotinamide, Calcium pantothenate, Pyridoxine hydrochloride, Thiamine mononitrate, Riboflavin, Retinyl acetate, Folic acid, Phytylmenaquinone, Ergocalciferol, d-Biotin and Cyanocobalamine.

Carrier: Glucose syrup.

CONTAINS ADDED FLAVOURS (NATURE IDENTICAL FLAVOURING SUBSTANCES)

attributes.title: Usage
attributes.value:
Step 1: Boil drinking water for 5 minutes & leave it lukewarm.
Step 2: Gradually mix 7 level scoops++ (33.5g) to 210ml of lukewarm water until powder is fully dissolved
Step 3: Mixing with water more than 37C may compromise benefits of the probiotics 
Step 4: Allow taste delicious with milk
++1 scoop ~ 4.78g
